title: President Rajapaksa welcomes President of China Xi Jinping
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Sri Lanka warmly received the President of Peoples’ Republic of China and General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Xi Jinping at the Bandaranaike International Airport this afternoon (16 September).
